[[File:Engelures.jpg|vignette|Engelures d'orteils]]

question.question: What is the primary characteristic of frostbite in a photograph?
question.option_a: Warmth and coloration of the affected area
question.option_b: Pale or blue discoloration of the affected area
question.option_c: Swelling and redness of the affected area
question.option_d: Presence of blisters on the affected area
